document_data.caption: A map showing the Dancing Court and surroundings in the Southern Ward of Waterdeep.
document_data.name: Dancing Court
document_data.mainbody: The '''Dancing Court''' was a cul-de-sac that was located in the city of [[Waterdeep]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Waterdeep}}
document_data.Location: The Dancing Court was located in the south section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Southern Ward|Southern Ward]]. It branched northeast off of the southern end of [[Slop Street]].
document_data.Activities: A tavern and festhall called [[the Jade Dancer]] sat at the end of the Dancing Court.
document_data.History: The Dancing Court was famous for the [[Moon Sphere]], a [[magical]] radiance that appeared on nights of the full moon.
